about.title: About
about.subtitle: Short profile
about.body1: As a certified software architect (iSAQB CPSA‑F), I like clear structures: clean interfaces, understandable architecture, and software that runs reliably day to day.
about.body2: I’ve worked across a wide range of industries and system landscapes. My background is geoinformatics, studied in Dresden; in projects, I combine product thinking with pragmatic delivery.
about.body3: I support teams part-time with well-scoped initiatives, architecture reviews, or focused feature packages. Full-time, I’m a Specialist at Alten GmbH. Outside work, I’m passionate about cycling and climbing in the beautiful Frankenjura.
